confirm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this knowledge?

uploadFile.label: Upload File
uploadFile.uploadText: Drag and drop a file here or click to upload

noEmbeddingModel: Please add an embedding model from the RAG settings page first
privateModeDescription: Firefox Private Mode does not support saving data to IndexedDB. Please add knowledge base from a normal window.

ragWorkspace.title: Knowledge search & chat
ragWorkspace.description: Configure knowledge search (RAG) options, run quick searches, and use Chat with grounded answers.
ragWorkspace.subtitleRag: Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) lets the assistant ground answers in your media, notes, and other indexed knowledge sources.
ragWorkspace.autoRagHelp: When enabled, the Chat workspace will run a knowledge (RAG) search before answering each message.
ragWorkspace.autoRagScopeHelp: This setting applies to replies in the main Chat view and sidepanel.
ragWorkspace.ragUnsupportedTitle: RAG search is not available on this server
ragWorkspace.ragUnsupportedDescription: This tldw server does not advertise the RAG endpoints. Open Diagnostics to see which APIs are available, then upgrade or reconfigure your server to enable RAG search.
ragWorkspace.searchInactiveHelp: Connect to your tldw server before running a search.
ragWorkspace.searchActiveHelp: Search runs against your configured RAG sources. Use Chat for multi-source knowledge search across media, notes, and more.
ragWorkspace.noResults: No RAG results yet. Enter a query to search your corpus.
ragWorkspace.advancedHelp: Optional: paste a JSON object with any UnifiedRAGRequest fields (e.g., strategy, enable_reranking). Leave blank to use defaults.
ragWorkspace.advancedInvalid: Invalid JSON for advanced RAG options.
ragWorkspace.advancedFlagsHelp: Tweak common UnifiedRAGRequest flags without editing JSON.
ragWorkspace.chatModeRagOn: Chat is using knowledge search (RAG) for replies.
ragWorkspace.chatModeRagOff: Toggle “Use RAG for every reply” to ground answers in your indexed content.
ragWorkspace.chatHint: Open the main Chat tab to see full conversation history with these knowledge (RAG) settings applied.
ragWorkspace.chatOpenPlayground: Open Chat with these knowledge search settings

rag.searchFailed: RAG search failed. Try again or check Diagnostics.

empty.demoTitle: Explore Knowledge QA in demo mode
empty.demoDescription: This demo shows how Knowledge QA can run RAG searches over sample content. Connect your own server later to search your own transcripts and documents.
empty.demoExample1: Try quick RAG searches and inspect results and citations.
empty.demoExample2: Connect your own server to enable Knowledge QA over your real media and notes.
empty.connectDescription: To use Knowledge QA and RAG search, first connect to your tldw server.
empty.connectExample1: Open Settings → tldw server to add your server URL.
empty.connectExample2: Use Diagnostics if your server is running but not reachable.
